entry.title: Buffy & Angel - Season 7 - Episode 21 - End of Days
entry.content:
Buffy & Angel - Season 7 - Episode 21 - End of Days20141015
There are some really moving speeches in this episode. I love the
way Buffy and Spike talk to each other. It's very lame the way
that she interacts with Angel though.
  • TV Shows
  • Buffy & Angel

entry.title: Buffy & Angel - Season 7 - Episode 22 - Chosen
entry.content:
Buffy & Angel - Season 7 - Episode 22 - Chosen20141015
This is such an awesome episode with so many great moments. It's
practically gold the whole time. I think it is quite lame the way
that Anya dies though, it seemed so unnecessary. I like it that
when Buffy asks Faith to "hold the line" she would be talking
about the battle line or "the Slayer line". I loved the way they
showed girls all over the world becoming Slayers. It was awesome
when they were playing Dungeons and Dragons.
  • TV Shows
  • Buffy & Angel

entry.title: Buffy & Angel - Season 7 - Episode 18 - Dirty Girls
entry.content:
Buffy & Angel - Season 7 - Episode 18 - Dirty Girls20141013
Caleb is so creepy and I'm so glad that Faith is back! I forgot
that she was going to come back! Caleb is SO brutal at the fight
at the end and it's ridiculous that suddenly now Xander is a
pirate. Xander's dream at the beginning was pretty intense :) I
loved when Andrew reviewed Faith's story! I really like that
Faith and Dawn act like they know each other, even though they've
never actually met.
  • TV Shows
  • Buffy & Angel

entry.title: Buffy & Angel - Season 7 - Episode 19 - Empty Places
entry.content:
Buffy & Angel - Season 7 - Episode 19 - Empty Places20141013
I think it is so dumb that the Potentials and Scoobies kick out
Buffy. It is so stupid. I love that Clem has one last
conversation on the show. I also like that Andrew wears the same
helmet that Dawn did on Spike's motorcycle. I love consistency
like that.
  • TV Shows
  • Buffy & Angel

entry.title: Buffy & Angel - Season 7 - Episode 20 - Touched
entry.content:
Buffy & Angel - Season 7 - Episode 20 - Touched20141013
It's dumb that Faith and Wood get together, although it totally
fits Faith's character. I like that Wood feels chilted the next
day. My wife and I talked about how Kennedy and Willow don't seem
to have a very emotional connection and instead are just together
because they are both lesbians and in the same place, which seems
lame. The ending is so intense!
  • TV Shows
  • Buffy & Angel

entry.title: Buffy & Angel - Season 7 - Episode 15 - Get It Done
entry.content:
Buffy & Angel - Season 7 - Episode 15 - Get It Done20141012
Anya is very hilarious in her cloyness to Spike. I really like
learning about the First Slayer, it's intense.
  • TV Shows
  • Buffy & Angel

entry.title: Buffy & Angel - Season 7 - Episode 16 - Storyteller
entry.content:
Buffy & Angel - Season 7 - Episode 16 - Storyteller20141012
I really like this episode, because Andrew is so funny. I love
when he glamorizes the girls. It's very cute. The touching moment
between Xander and Anya is great too. Andrew is so funny.
  • TV Shows
  • Buffy & Angel

entry.title: Buffy & Angel - Season 7 - Episode 17 - Lies My Parents Told Me
entry.content:
Buffy & Angel - Season 7 - Episode 17 - Lies My Parents Told Me20141012
This episode is crazy. I had forgotten about Spike's mom and what
a punk she is. I liked Anya's comment that Spike "could slaughter
a hundred frat boys" and still be forgiven. :)
  • TV Shows
  • Buffy & Angel

entry.title: Movie: Muppets Most Wanted, starring Ricky Gervais (2014)
entry.content:
Movie: Muppets Most Wanted, starring Ricky Gervais (2014)20141012
I loved all the funny Russian jokes.

entry.title: Buffy & Angel - Season 7 - Episode 13 - The Killer in Me
entry.content:
Buffy & Angel - Season 7 - Episode 13 - The Killer in Me20141011
This is a crazy episode. Warren is such a punk and a big jerk,
it's really bizarre that he keeps coming back. It's also nuts
that Amy is clearly really strong now. I hadn't even thought of
Giles as potentially being a bad guy. I like that Spike's chip is
gone.
  • TV Shows
  • Buffy & Angel

entry.title: Buffy & Angel - Season 7 - Episode 14 - First Date
entry.content:
Buffy & Angel - Season 7 - Episode 14 - First Date20141011
It's so hilarious how Xander's love life is so cursed. Andrew is
great too. I think that it is a bit lame that Principal Wood is
special.
  • TV Shows
  • Buffy & Angel

entry.title: Buffy & Angel - Season 7 - Episode 10 - Bring on the Night
entry.content:
Buffy & Angel - Season 7 - Episode 10 - Bring on the Night20141010
I really like the way the Potentials show up and I really dislike
the way that Faith isn't re-introduced. I supposed it is good
that they stuck to the same actress, but sad that she couldn't
get back in the final season. Buffy's speech at the end is great.
  • TV Shows
  • Buffy & Angel

entry.title: Buffy & Angel - Season 7 - Episode 11 - Showtime
entry.content:
Buffy & Angel - Season 7 - Episode 11 - Showtime20141010
I love the way that Buffy is on the offensive just like she said
she would be. The First's actions in this episode are so
cool. Buffy's plan at the end is epic too. It's neat how
nonchalant the mind-reading happens. Andrew's dialogue is so
amazing.
  • TV Shows
  • Buffy & Angel

entry.title: Buffy & Angel - Season 7 - Episode 12 - Potential
entry.content:
Buffy & Angel - Season 7 - Episode 12 - Potential20141010
It's very sad that Dawn is so heart-broken, but Xander's pep talk
at the end is one of the most touching parts of the show. Amanda
is very cleverly written too. (The actress was great on Freaks
and Geeks too.) It's neat that the Wikipedia page mentions that
this would have been her birthday episode.
  • TV Shows
  • Buffy & Angel

entry.title: Buffy & Angel - Season 7 - Episode 9 - Never Leave Me
entry.content:
Buffy & Angel - Season 7 - Episode 9 - Never Leave Me20141009
A lot of crazy things are revealed in this episode. In
particular, the Principal has more stuff going on than was
revealed before and the Watchers are jerks.
  • TV Shows
  • Buffy & Angel

entry.title: Buffy & Angel - Season 7 - Episode 7 - Conversations with Dead People
entry.content:
Buffy & Angel - Season 7 - Episode 7 - Conversations with Dead People20141008
This episode is crazy. It is really funny how Buffy has a therapy
session. Dawn's story is insane and really scary. It freaked us
out a lot.
  • TV Shows
  • Buffy & Angel

entry.title: Buffy & Angel - Season 7 - Episode 8 - Sleeper
entry.content:
Buffy & Angel - Season 7 - Episode 8 - Sleeper20141008
I'm glad that Spike is getting help now. I like him and am glad
that he'll start being better. "The First" is messed up. I liked
it when the singer says that she "hates playing in vampire
towns".
  • TV Shows
  • Buffy & Angel
